PageText.pText: <div class="TableHeadingClass">Fig.9.13: Centralized Control of IoT Devices

The Rule-placement at access devices, while considering mobility and heterogeneity of end-users can be taken care by the fixed access channels, mobile access channels and intelligent aggregation as shown in Figure 9.14.
<div class="TableHeadingClass">Fig.9.14: Rule Placement at Access Devices
Rule Placement and traffic engineering at backbone networks is implemented by the Transport Network as shown in Figure 9.15.]></pText> </PageText> </PageData> </main>
